overview: Doug Dalissandro joins Lightower Fiber Networks with 19 years experience in the telecommunications industry. Prior to Lightower Fiber Networks, Mr. Dalissandro has held various executive and sales management positions, including Executive Vice President of Sales for One Communications and Executive Vice President of Sales & Marketing for Conversent Communications. Before joining Conversent, Mr. Dalissandro was Vice President of Sales at Teleglobe. Prior to Teleglobe he was Vice President of Sales for Frontier Communications and Allnet Communications.
